thread.section_title: Courtyard Paris Saint Denis - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Saint-Denis, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Everything is not bad except location
thread.title_full: Everything is not bad except location - Review of Courtyard Paris Saint Denis, Saint-Denis, France - TripAdvisor

author: Cheryl H
title: Everything is not bad except location
text:
It is north of Paris, which takes about an hour to reach by Metro. Out of the Metro Station, you get to walk about ten to fifteen minutes to get to the entrance of this hotel.
The district is a bit 'rotten' with closed down shops and graffiti, and some people loitering on some abandoned 'tunnels' or 'footpaths'. It is a rather quiet district otherwise, and a bit too quiet when you come back at night.
With that room rate we got and the comparatively spacious and well-equipped rooms you get within Paris region, I think there is nothing to complain about.
One thing is, hope it has been improved since my stay, that when I stayed there, free Internet access was only provided in public areas of the Hotel. You can imagine some guests sitting in the lobby at night to stay connected with their friends and family, or, with the world.
